original_text: Instead of that, we should write a letter to tell them how to live as believers. We should say to them, “Do not eat any food which people have given to their idols. That food has become unclean. Do not have sex with anyone that you are not married to. If people have strangled an animal to kill it, do not eat its meat. Do not eat anything that still has blood in it.”
korean_text: 다만 우상의 더러운 것과 음행과 목매어 죽인 것과 피를 멀리하라고 편지하는 것이 옳으니

sentences.original_text: Instead of that, we should write a letter
sentences.korean_translation: 그 대신 우리는 편지를 써야 합니다

sentences.original_text: to tell them how to live as believers
sentences.korean_translation: 믿는 자로서 어떻게 살아야 하는지 그들에게 알려주기 위해

sentences.original_text: Do not eat any food which people have given to their idols
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 우상에게 바친 어떤 음식도 먹지 마라

sentences.original_text: Do not have sex with anyone that you are not married to
sentences.korean_translation: 결혼하지 않은 사람과 성관계를 갖지 마라

sentences.original_text: If people have strangled an animal to kill it
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 동물을 죽이기 위해 목을 조였다면

sentences.original_text: Do not eat anything that still has blood in it
sentences.korean_translation: 피가 아직 남아있는 어떤 것도 먹지 마라
